formats.name: DotGraph
formats.author: M. C. DeMarco
formats.description: displays a graph of your story, with several options for color-coding, clustering, and labeling nodes; it also detects unreachable nodes and terminal leaves

formats.name: DotScap
formats.author: M. C. DeMarco
formats.description: a DotGraph-like format that converts your story into a Scapple mind-map graph and includes a subset of DotGraph's rendering options

formats.name: Journal
formats.author: Leon Arnott
formats.description: a horizontal variant of the Twine 1 stretchtext story format Jonah

formats.name: Paloma
formats.author: M. C. DeMarco
formats.description: a Jonah-style stretchtext story format for Twine 1 and 2

formats.name: PrePub
formats.author: M. C. DeMarco
formats.description: converts a Twine 1 or 2 story into a MultiMarkdown format used for generating eBooks

formats.name: Wasteland
formats.author: Jessica Paoli
formats.description: a semantic Twine [1] Story Format focused on readability
